pros:
It's a brilliant cause and it does make difference to lives around the world. 
Some lovely people to work with
cons:
Leadership is awful - lack of commercial awareness, financial resources wasted at all level due to poor financial decisions. 
Lack of vision 
High level of nepotism
Clique culture - if you fit in you get places, if you dare question or have different views, you are shut down.
See staff as disposable resources.
